title: Video: How The Race Was Won® Liège-Bastogne-Liège 2021
content:
Defending Tour de France champion Tadej Pogacar (UAE-Team Emirates) narrowly out sprints world champion Julian Alaphilippe (Deceuninck-Quick Step) to take his first Monument victory at Liège-Bastogne-Liège.

The two were part of a five-man move that went clear on the final climb of the race, the Côte de la Roche-Aux-Faucons.

author: Abby Mickey
